unnormalised: Weather-dependent yields, eh? Tell me about it! Here in Maharashtra, a bad monsoon can ruin a whole season. Remember that drought in Vidarbha around 2018? My uncle, Ramesh, lost his entire cotton crop. We're praying for a good monsoon this year, after that crazy heatwave on 05/05/2023 at 14:00 hrs. Hopefully, IMD's forecast for 25/12/2024 holds true, or else, another Diwali with no bonus! Even our small 2-acre plot needs proper planning, like they teach at Pantnagar University. It's all Karma and weather, bhai!
